"Our Hardwork, No Shortcut"

Who We Are?

AIKAM INDIA is a registered & most trusted pharmacy based in Lucknow, Indiranagar. Aikam India aims to solve delivery hurdles mainly availability of a particular medicine & delivery timing. With thousands of pharma companies in the market, it is impossible for any retailer to maintain stock of all medicines. Aikam India is solving this issue with its robust & data-rich system developed over time that has information about almost all the pharma companies active in Lucknow & other districts of Uttar Pradesh along with their registered stockists who provide us the medicines & other products.

Our Services!

  • Just one call or WhatsApp message & Medicines will be delivered at Your doorstep with Heavy Discount
  • Any Medicine, let us say it again, Loud, & Clear "ANY MEDICINE" whether allopathic, Homoeopathic, Ayurvedic, Ethical, or generic, We'll deliver at your doorstep with the best available discount.
  • Our express delivery service provides you all OTC medicines at your doorstep in Lucknow within 1 Hour & other medicines on the same day.
  • Deliveries outside Lucknow & anywhere in any Village, Kasba, Tehsil, or district of U.P are catered within 3 days.
